template&lt;&gt; struct hash&lt;std::text_encoding&gt;;

The template specialization of {{lc|std::hash}} for {{lc|std::text_encoding}} allows users to obtain hashes of encoded id and name of type {{lc|std::text_encoding}}.

{{tt|operator()}} of this specialization is noexcept.
